```{r}
library(reshape2)
```

#Read in Allelic imbalance and junction analysis results
```{r}
AI<-read.csv("C:/Users/Jenna/Documents/UKy_RNASeq/MBASEDResults_15X2X_Exome_10Percent_Bonf_SiginCMNotInControls.csv")
AI_melt<-melt(AI)
colnames(AI_melt)<-c("gene", "Sample", "pvalue")
AI_melt$Sample<-gsub("X", "", AI_melt$Sample)


junctions<-read.csv("C:/Users/jenna/OneDrive/Documents/UKy/_AllFilteredJunctions__Settings__5_3_0.1_0.1_3_.csv")
junctions$UniqueID<- paste(junctions$SampleID, junctions$geneid,sep=":")
```

#Find overlaps between potentially pathogenic junctions + AI in that same gene
```{r}
JunctionAIOverlaps<- junctions[junctions$UniqueID %in% AI$UniqueID,]
```
